Pre-Game Insights: England may have won Group C but have been criticized for uninspiring performances.
Calls for changes in the starting lineup, particularly regarding young players like Kobbie Mainoo, Cole Palmer, and Anthony Gordon.
Slovakia has been praised for their defensive strength and their upset win against Belgium.
